mapper.select: select no from project where project_name=#{projectName }

select jh.no, jh.full_url as fullUrl, jh.build_number as buildNumber, jh.duration, jh.status,jh.branch, jh.commit, jh.date, task.crew_no as crewNo, crew.master_crew_user_no as masterCrewUserNo from jenkinshook as jh , project as pj, task , crew where jh.project_no = pj.no and pj.no =task.project_no and task.crew_no = crew.no order by jh.no desc limit 1;
